eheth dan wade kanapita gasi wides walin kastiya buruthu pitin meheta ethi.mese wides winimaya galagena ennata patan gena aththe buwalanthaye ‘ediyukesan’ nisaya.buwalanthaye rata salli hoyana pradhana aadayam margaya ediyukesan hewath ‘adhyapane’ya.’ediyukeshan’ walin salli wiyadam wenawa misa upayanne kesedayi kenakuta sithiya haka.ee pilibandawa pradhana marga dekak athi bawin eyin ekak gana palamuwa wisthara kiyami.pitaratawala athi pradhana pele pasal wana okspod, kembrij, kanbara, barbara, kaliponiya, sobon, haward yana iskolawalin upadhi gaththu lamayin aacharya mahacharya upadhiyata pera igena ganna enne buwalanthayataya.buwalanthaye sisshathwa kiya wibhagayak thibe.

norwud pradeshaye di lamayeku pahara ganimata thath kala pudgalayeku athadanguwata ganimata polisiya samath wi thibe.norwud, karkars wol wathu yaye di pasal yamin siti gahanu lamayeku pahara ganimata adala pudgalaya thath kara athi bawa polisiya sandahan karana ladi.kese wethath ema wathu yaye sewaya kala kamkaruwange madihath wimen adala pudgalaya athadanguwata ganimata haki wi thibe. 12 hawiridi ema gahanu lamaya pahara ganimata thath kala adala sakakaruwa yathuru padiyakin pamina athi bawa norwud polisiya prakasha karayi.siddhiya sambandhayen norwud polisiya wadi dura parikshana aarambha kara thibe.
